Texts.Chs: Frackin'Universe说明指南 II
Texts.Eng: Frackin'Universe Guide 2

Texts.Chs: ^green;阿托罗斯^white;：一个真正诡异的世界，它既是死的也是活的。有着这种地形的星球完全由各种肉块组成，有些人甚至相信星球可以产生感情。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Atropus^white; - A truly unusual type of world, Atropus planets are both living and dead. They are quite literally composed of flesh, and some even believe them to be sentient. Universally, it is thought that they are (and I quote) - pretty darn gross.

Texts.Chs: ^green;血石^white;：当你在这里探险时，你会不由自主地对血液产生畏惧。因为，在这里血真的是无处不在。当然了，你可以试着砍一些树，说不定里面就蕴藏有你所需的材料。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Bloodstone^white; - When wandering a bloodstone world, you'll be reminded of blood an awful lot. Because, y'know...blood pools everywhere. And really messed up looking trees. They are a great way to stock up on several sorts of materials through extraction, though.

Texts.Chs: ^green;沼泽^white;：这里有着丰富的藻豆荚，粪便和植物，由于频繁下雨的原因，这里也拥有着大量的沼泽。在这里你会感觉到移动困难，但这里盛产的各类资源将会让你乐不思蜀。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Bog^white; - Rich in algae, muck, and plant life. They are ripe with rainy weather, and thick bogs. Travel can be difficult, but the surplus algae will be useful.

Texts.Chs: ^green;水晶卫星^white;：这里真的很冷。这里可不是露营的好地方，但是这里却盛产硅、水晶。还有请注意水晶雨，虽然它很好看，被它砸到可不是好玩的。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Crystal Moon^white; - Sure, they are really cold. Sure, they aren't comfortable camping. But they are a rich source of silicon, crystals and that sort of thing. Watch out for the crystal rain, though. Ow.

Texts.Chs: ^green;冰冻卫星^white;：这种寒冷的卫星并不是完全没有威胁，所以请谨慎行事。由于没有空气，所以并没有任何生命在地表活动。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Frozen Moon^white; - These frigid moons are quaint, and not altogether threatening. No life walks on their surfaces. On account of the whole no-air thing.

Texts.Chs: ^green;凝胶^white;：是的。你的读音非常正确。这是就是一个黏黏的世界。有用的遗传材料在这里遍地都是。还有绝对不要尝试吃莴苣，除非你真的很喜欢无味的凝胶液体流到嘴里的感觉。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Gelatinous^white; - Yep. You read that right. A world made of slime. Great for genetic material at least. Definitely don't try the lettuce, unless you really like flavorless gelatin soup squishing in your mouth.

Texts.Chs: ^green;冰冻废土^white;：这里存在着绝对致命的寒冷。就连北极熊都不可能在这里生存，更别说你了，如果你没有对应的措施，你会在到达的几秒钟内被冻住。还有千万不要在水中游泳，里面会更冷。不过这里有着一种独特的冰，你可以采集一点回去，希望这对你有用。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Ice Waste^white; - Ice wastes are absolutely terrifyingly cold. You do not want to go for a polar bear swim here, since you'd be flash frozen in seconds. Don't swim in the water. It's even colder. They do have some unique sorts of ice there, which provide something extra when extracting.

Texts.Chs: ^green;炼狱^white;：如果你防护很薄弱，我不建议去这种星球上。星球的居民偶尔会提供氧气，但别靠太近，他们并不是很好客。而这里的资源有朱砂和熔岩。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Infernus^white; - I'd not suggest going here without a lot of protection. Their surfaces are far from hospitable, though at least they have the courtesy of providing a breathable atmostphere most of the time. And resources like cinnabar and magma stone.

Texts.Chs: ^green;辐射^white;：在这个世界中存在着大量放射性的岩石。在这里，你将会发现大量放射性的资源。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Irradiated^white; - These radioactive rocks are curiously abundant in native life. Granted, it's not edible and you still don't want to hang out there too much. You'll find heaps of radioactive resources here, obviously.

Texts.Chs: ^green;无光^white;：这种星球异常的古老，并且就连看到恒星的光芒在这里也是一种奢望。所以你最好准备一些可以照明的东西，我打赌你不愿在一片漆黑的情况下踩到野兽的身上吧。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Lightless^white; - These unusual worlds are ancient and something prevents any sun from reaching their surfaces. There may be some useful things there, however. Bring lots of lights!

Texts.Chs: ^green;金属卫星^white;：这种卫星又称之为赛博星球，因为上面有着机械类的生命体，由于构造完全是金属物质，所以当你需要金属的时候，千万不要错过它。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Metallic Moon^white; - Not much to say. Moons composed almost entirely of metal. Quite useful when you need metallic ores.

Texts.Chs: ^green;山脉^white;：虽然你一眼就可以从名字了解到这种星球的含义，但是我告诉你，你跑了一圈你就知道这个名字显然不足以突显出星球的陡峭与颠簸。这里也有着丰富的资源，但是如果你没有适合的攀登装备，或许你会难受一点点。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Mountainous^white; - While it is probably fairly obvious by the name, I have been instructed to inform you that these worlds are rather bumpy and mountainy. They are rich in resources, and quite a pain in the butt to explore without climbing gear.

Texts.Chs: ^green;新世界^white;：在无比浩瀚的宇宙中有着全新的世界等待着你的发现。接下来的内容将详细介绍其中几种。
Texts.Eng: ^green;New Worlds^white; - There are new worlds across the cosmos awaiting exploration. The next few pages will detail some of them.

Texts.Chs: ^green;液氮海^white;：听名字就知道这并不是个适合游泳的星球，对，它真的不是，所以请把你手上的救生圈放下。不过如果你是冲着氮来的，那真是来对地方了。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Nitrogen Sea^white; - Doesn't this sound like a fun place to swim? Yea, it really isn't. Some handy liquid there, though.

Texts.Chs: ^green;半影^white;：这种独特的世界对太阳发出的热量或者光线都有着一定的削弱。无论如何，黑暗与不安在里面无处不在。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Penumbra^white; - Pitch black for most of their existence, these rare worlds have some sort of environmental barrier to the sun. A natural sunglasses-effect in the ozone, or something. Whatever the case...dark and spooky.

Texts.Chs: ^green;原始森林^white;：巨大的树木，大量野生动物和丰富的自然资源让这种星球成为可以尝试度假的地方。不过你还是得留意你的周围，因为你永远都不知道在黝黑的丛林深处潜伏着什么。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Primeval Forest^white; - Huge trees, lots of wildlife and abundant natural resources make these a wonderful place to visit. Typically not too dangerous, but watch your back anyhow...you never know what lurks in these huge forests.

Texts.Chs: ^green;原体^white;：这里真的不是个居住的好地方，因为无处不在的原液将会持续削弱你的身体，并且在这里的空气中存在着某种破坏你护甲的细菌，再加上黏液风暴，这真是太糟了！不过这里有着各种奇形怪状的植物，说不定会为你的基因实验带来前所未有的进展。还有原体矿，这里可是你唯一获取它的地方。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Proto World^white; - These bizarre planets are not inhospitable, but the natural biological slime there can melt your flesh. Plus the slime storms, ew. And really, really weird plant life. But they are the only place to get the extremely valuable protocite. You'll need it. Also be advised that the atmosphere contains bizarre bacteria that affect unconditioned lifeforms negatively. They will sap armor rapidly. Bring protection.

Texts.Chs: ^green;雨林^white;：这里植物生长得非常茂盛，而雨林有着丰富的土壤构成，某些土壤或许就是你所需要的材料。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Rainforest^white; - Teeming with plantlife, Rainforests have rich soil, far exceeding the capacity of ordinary dirt.

Texts.Chs: ^green;硫磺^white;：这里可能是你遇到过的最恶劣的环境。每一秒，你都有可能在这个世界中丧命。风，乱飞的碎片，缺氧还有各种极端的考验。但是，这里却有着含量非常丰富的硫磺。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Sulphur World^white; - These are probably the harshest environment you'll encounter. Every moment on a sulphur world is lethal. Deadly winds, blowing debris, no oxygen. Lovely. But, they are extremely rich in Sulphur. Not the place for a summer house, though. Yet people keep trying...

Texts.Chs: ^green;潮汐^white;：这里的海洋比正常的海洋星球的特点就在于缺少岛屿，另外海水也会更加的不稳定。你在这里钓鱼或冲浪时，可以去看看珊瑚礁，你会爱上它们的。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Tidewater^white; - These oceans are vastly more rocky and unstable than typical water planets. They generally lack tropical islands, but if you love rocky terrain and coral reefs they might be right up your alley.

Texts.Chs: ^green;荒漠^white;：这种世界是被居住在上面的生物所遗弃的。以前的居民留下的各种废墟遍布整个世界。有可能是遭遇天灾，也有可能是整体迁移，无论如何，这种世界上并没有太多有价值的东西，不过至少还剩下一些矿石，你只能祈祷别被人挖光了。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Wasteland^white; - Once bustling populations lived on these desolate rocks. Their ruins stud the surface like discarded refuse. Tragic, really. Not much on these planets is of value unless you are talking about digging. You'll find ore here, at least.
